name: Let Me Fist You
author: jett862
notes: So I attempted to KoG this season with aromages, tried a literal ton of deck variations. I gave up once I unlocked dynatherium and switched to my fire fist deck. Mantikor was mvp against SSA. Biggest enemy this season was bricking my opening hand.
main1: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Coyote

main13: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Raven
